p: Yu et al. [ 20] indicated that jujube coated with CS + nano-SiO 2 displayed the lowest red index value, as well as the lowest respiration rate among all the treatments. Moreover, this composite coating maintained high SOD, POD, CAT levels, while reducing phenylalanine ammonia-lyase (PAL) activity, delaying MDA elevation, and preserving the total fruit flavonoids.
